data.name: La maledizione dellâ€™Uccello Serpente - Vicende Parallele
data.detailed_description:
"Vicende Parallele" tells the adventures of the monk Abraham Dupont that take place simultaneously with the story of the main game.
To find a solution to the looming darkness, Abe decides to go to the village of Lagomanto, where the Durin Mausoleum is located.
Here the monk wants to investigate the ancient tombs in search of clues to the great heroes of the past and their weapons and strategies.
It will not be easy, however, to reach Lagomanto...

This DLC contains a whole pixel art game, the plot of which is connected with the main story of the Snake Bird.



Warning: the game is in Italian.

data.short_description: A pleasant RPG to explore the events of the valley, while in the main game you are fighting the SnakeBird. Warning: the game is in Italian.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GPU that supports DirectX 9.0 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GPU that supports DirectX 9.0 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
